S

Shape - Class in shapes
The Shape class is an abstract base class that defines a generic 3D shape characterized by its height.
Shape(double) - Constructor for class shapes.Shape
Constructs a Shape with a specified height.
ShapeComparator - Class in comparators
The ShapeComparator class is a flexible comparator that allows Shape objects to be compared based on one of three selectable attributes: - Height ("h") - Base Area ("a") - Volume ("v") This comparator is used dynamically depending on user input, allowing the same sorting logic to be reused for multiple metrics.
ShapeComparator(String) - Constructor for class comparators.ShapeComparator
Constructor that defines the comparison mode based on user selection.
shapes - package shapes
The shapes package defines various geometric shapes such as cylinders, cones, and pyramids.
Sorter<T> - Class in utilities
The Sorter class provides multiple sorting algorithms to order Shape objects.
Sorter(Comparator<T>) - Constructor for class utilities.Sorter
Constructs a new Sorter instance using the specified comparator to define how elements in an array will be compared and ordered.
sortUsing(String, T[]) - Method in class utilities.Sorter
Selects and executes the sorting algorithm based on the user's input.
SquarePrism - Class in shapes
The SquarePrism class represents a three-dimensional prism with a square base.
SquarePrism(double, double) - Constructor for class shapes.SquarePrism
Constructs a SquarePrism object with a given height and side length.
